p: VK2/E6E7 were grown in 24-well plates containing aseptic slides and treated as described above. The supernatant was discarded and the cells were washed twice with PBS. The cells were fixed with glutaraldehyde at room temperature for 2 h and incubated at 4 °C overnight. The samples were prepared and observed by SEM (SU8100 HITACHI, Japan).
